# Data Access

> Working with data sources including SQLite databases and XML documents. `Microsoft.Data.Sqlite` provides a lightweight ADO.NET provider for SQLite; `System.Xml` namespaces support parsing, writing, XPath queries, XSLT transforms, and schema validation. For relational databases, also see Entity Framework Core.

## Topic Indices

- [Microsoft.Data.Sqlite](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/llms.txt): 22 topics; ADO.NET provider for embedded SQLite database access.
- [XML Documents and Data](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/xml/llms.txt): 111 topics; Parse, write, and transform XML with `XmlReader`, `XmlDocument`, and XSLT.
